name: evm-mcp-server_get_chain_info
description: Get information about an EVM network

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', etc.) or chain ID. Supports all EVM-compatible networks. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_resolve_ens
description: Resolve an ENS name to an Ethereum address

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', etc.) or chain ID. ENS resolution works best on Ethereum mainnet. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_get_supported_networks
description: Get a list of supported EVM networks

name: evm-mcp-server_get_block_by_number
description: Get a block by its block number

network.description: Network name or chain ID. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_get_latest_block
description: Get the latest block from the EVM

network.description: Network name or chain ID. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_get_balance
description: Get the native token balance (ETH, MATIC, etc.) for an address

address.description: The wallet address or ENS name (e.g., '0x1234...' or 'vitalik.eth') to check the balance for

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', etc.) or chain ID. Supports all EVM-compatible networks. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_get_erc20_balance
description: Get the ERC20 token balance of an Ethereum address

network.description: Network name or chain ID. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_get_token_balance
description: Get the balance of an ERC20 token for an address

tokenAddress.description: The contract address or ENS name of the ERC20 token (e.g., '0xA0b86991c6218b36c1d19D4a2e9Eb0cE3606eB48' for USDC or 'uniswap.eth')

ownerAddress.description: The wallet address or ENS name to check the balance for (e.g., '0x1234...' or 'vitalik.eth')

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', etc.) or chain ID. Supports all EVM-compatible networks. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_get_transaction
description: Get detailed information about a specific transaction by its hash. Includes sender, recipient, value, data, and more.

txHash.description: The transaction hash to look up (e.g., '0x1234...')

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', 'polygon') or chain ID. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_get_transaction_receipt
description: Get a transaction receipt by its hash

txHash.description: The transaction hash to look up

network.description: Network name or chain ID. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_estimate_gas
description: Estimate the gas cost for a transaction

value.description: The amount of ETH to send in ether (e.g., '0.1')

data.description: The transaction data as a hex string

network.description: Network name or chain ID. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_transfer_eth
description: Transfer native tokens (ETH, MATIC, etc.) to an address

privateKey.description: Private key of the sender account in hex format (with or without 0x prefix). SECURITY: This is used only for transaction signing and is not stored.

to.description: The recipient address or ENS name (e.g., '0x1234...' or 'vitalik.eth')

amount.description: Amount to send in ETH (or the native token of the network), as a string (e.g., '0.1')

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', etc.) or chain ID. Supports all EVM-compatible networks. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_transfer_erc20
description: Transfer ERC20 tokens to another address

privateKey.description: Private key of the sending account (this is used for signing and is never stored)

tokenAddress.description: The address of the ERC20 token contract

amount.description: The amount of tokens to send (in token units, e.g., '10' for 10 tokens)

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', etc.) or chain ID. Supports all EVM-compatible networks. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_approve_token_spending
description: Approve another address (like a DeFi protocol or exchange) to spend your ERC20 tokens. This is often required before interacting with DeFi protocols.

privateKey.description: Private key of the token owner account in hex format (with or without 0x prefix). SECURITY: This is used only for transaction signing and is not stored.

tokenAddress.description: The contract address of the ERC20 token to approve for spending (e.g., '0xA0b86991c6218b36c1d19D4a2e9Eb0cE3606eB48' for USDC on Ethereum)

spenderAddress.description: The contract address being approved to spend your tokens (e.g., a DEX or lending protocol)

amount.description: The amount of tokens to approve in token units, not wei (e.g., '1000' to approve spending 1000 tokens). Use a very large number for unlimited approval.

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', 'polygon') or chain ID. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_transfer_nft
description: Transfer an NFT (ERC721 token) from one address to another. Requires the private key of the current owner for signing the transaction.

privateKey.description: Private key of the NFT owner account in hex format (with or without 0x prefix). SECURITY: This is used only for transaction signing and is not stored.

tokenAddress.description: The contract address of the NFT collection (e.g., '0xBC4CA0EdA7647A8aB7C2061c2E118A18a936f13D' for Bored Ape Yacht Club)

tokenId.description: The ID of the specific NFT to transfer (e.g., '1234')

toAddress.description: The recipient wallet address that will receive the NFT

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', 'polygon') or chain ID. Most NFTs are on Ethereum mainnet, which is the default.

name: evm-mcp-server_transfer_erc1155
description: Transfer ERC1155 tokens to another address. ERC1155 is a multi-token standard that can represent both fungible and non-fungible tokens in a single contract.

privateKey.description: Private key of the token owner account in hex format (with or without 0x prefix). SECURITY: This is used only for transaction signing and is not stored.

tokenAddress.description: The contract address of the ERC1155 token collection (e.g., '0x76BE3b62873462d2142405439777e971754E8E77')

tokenId.description: The ID of the specific token to transfer (e.g., '1234')

amount.description: The quantity of tokens to send (e.g., '1' for a single NFT or '10' for 10 fungible tokens)

toAddress.description: The recipient wallet address that will receive the tokens

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', 'polygon') or chain ID. ERC1155 tokens exist across many networks. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_transfer_token
description: Transfer ERC20 tokens to an address

privateKey.description: Private key of the sender account in hex format (with or without 0x prefix). SECURITY: This is used only for transaction signing and is not stored.

tokenAddress.description: The contract address or ENS name of the ERC20 token to transfer (e.g., '0xA0b86991c6218b36c1d19D4a2e9Eb0cE3606eB48' for USDC or 'uniswap.eth')

toAddress.description: The recipient address or ENS name that will receive the tokens (e.g., '0x1234...' or 'vitalik.eth')

amount.description: Amount of tokens to send as a string (e.g., '100' for 100 tokens). This will be adjusted for the token's decimals.

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', etc.) or chain ID. Supports all EVM-compatible networks. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_read_contract
description: Read data from a smart contract by calling a view/pure function. This doesn't modify blockchain state and doesn't require gas or signing.

contractAddress.description: The address of the smart contract to interact with

abi.description: The ABI (Application Binary Interface) of the smart contract function, as a JSON array

functionName.description: The name of the function to call on the contract (e.g., 'balanceOf')

args.description: The arguments to pass to the function, as an array (e.g., ['0x1234...'])

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', 'polygon') or chain ID. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_write_contract
description: Write data to a smart contract by calling a state-changing function. This modifies blockchain state and requires gas payment and transaction signing.

contractAddress.description: The address of the smart contract to interact with

abi.description: The ABI (Application Binary Interface) of the smart contract function, as a JSON array

functionName.description: The name of the function to call on the contract (e.g., 'transfer')

args.description: The arguments to pass to the function, as an array (e.g., ['0x1234...', '1000000000000000000'])

privateKey.description: Private key of the sending account in hex format (with or without 0x prefix). SECURITY: This is used only for transaction signing and is not stored.

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', 'polygon') or chain ID. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_is_contract
description: Check if an address is a smart contract or an externally owned account (EOA)

address.description: The wallet or contract address or ENS name to check (e.g., '0x1234...' or 'uniswap.eth')

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', etc.) or chain ID. Supports all EVM-compatible networks. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_get_token_info
description: Get comprehensive information about an ERC20 token including name, symbol, decimals, total supply, and other metadata. Use this to analyze any token on EVM chains.

tokenAddress.description: The contract address of the ERC20 token (e.g., '0xA0b86991c6218b36c1d19D4a2e9Eb0cE3606eB48' for USDC on Ethereum)

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', 'polygon') or chain ID. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_get_token_balance_erc20
description: Get ERC20 token balance for an address

address.description: The address to check balance for

network.description: Network name or chain ID. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_get_nft_info
description: Get detailed information about a specific NFT (ERC721 token), including collection name, symbol, token URI, and current owner if available.

tokenAddress.description: The contract address of the NFT collection (e.g., '0xBC4CA0EdA7647A8aB7C2061c2E118A18a936f13D' for Bored Ape Yacht Club)

tokenId.description: The ID of the specific NFT token to query (e.g., '1234')

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', 'polygon') or chain ID. Most NFTs are on Ethereum mainnet, which is the default.

name: evm-mcp-server_check_nft_ownership
description: Check if an address owns a specific NFT

tokenAddress.description: The contract address or ENS name of the NFT collection (e.g., '0xBC4CA0EdA7647A8aB7C2061c2E118A18a936f13D' for BAYC or 'boredapeyachtclub.eth')

tokenId.description: The ID of the NFT to check (e.g., '1234')

ownerAddress.description: The wallet address or ENS name to check ownership against (e.g., '0x1234...' or 'vitalik.eth')

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', etc.) or chain ID. Supports all EVM-compatible networks. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_get_erc1155_token_uri
description: Get the metadata URI for an ERC1155 token (multi-token standard used for both fungible and non-fungible tokens). The URI typically points to JSON metadata about the token.

tokenAddress.description: The contract address of the ERC1155 token collection (e.g., '0x76BE3b62873462d2142405439777e971754E8E77')

tokenId.description: The ID of the specific token to query metadata for (e.g., '1234')

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', 'polygon') or chain ID. ERC1155 tokens exist across many networks. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_get_nft_balance
description: Get the total number of NFTs owned by an address from a specific collection. This returns the count of NFTs, not individual token IDs.

tokenAddress.description: The contract address of the NFT collection (e.g., '0xBC4CA0EdA7647A8aB7C2061c2E118A18a936f13D' for Bored Ape Yacht Club)

ownerAddress.description: The wallet address to check the NFT balance for (e.g., '0x1234...')

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', 'polygon') or chain ID. Most NFTs are on Ethereum mainnet, which is the default.

name: evm-mcp-server_get_erc1155_balance
description: Get the balance of a specific ERC1155 token ID owned by an address. ERC1155 allows multiple tokens of the same ID, so the balance can be greater than 1.

tokenAddress.description: The contract address of the ERC1155 token collection (e.g., '0x76BE3b62873462d2142405439777e971754E8E77')

tokenId.description: The ID of the specific token to check the balance for (e.g., '1234')

ownerAddress.description: The wallet address to check the token balance for (e.g., '0x1234...')

network.description: Network name (e.g., 'ethereum', 'optimism', 'arbitrum', 'base', 'polygon') or chain ID. ERC1155 tokens exist across many networks. Defaults to Ethereum mainnet.

name: evm-mcp-server_get_address_from_private_key
description: Get the EVM address derived from a private key

privateKey.description: Private key in hex format (with or without 0x prefix). SECURITY: This is used only for address derivation and is not stored.
